sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { StyleSheet, Image, Text, View, ImageBackground } from 'react-native';
import { Icon } from 'react-native-elements';
import Header from '../components/Header.js';
import theme, { colors } from '../style.js';

export default function Announcements() {
  return (
    <View style={styles.Container}>
      <Header title={'Announcements'} />
      <View style={styles.List}>
        <View style={styles.Card}>
          <View style={styles.Frame6}>
            <Text style={styles.Txt914}>Donna Regali needs your help</Text>
            <Text style={styles.Txt829}>
              Saint Bernard Hospital, Angel Street 21
            </Text>
          </View>
          <View style={styles.Frame7}>
            <Text style={styles.Txt539}>Short Information</Text>
            <Text style={styles.Txt715}>
              Donna needs donations for AB blood type.
            </Text>
          </View>
        </View>

        {/* <View style={styles.Frame4}>
          <View style={styles.FriendsRow}>
            <View style={styles.Friend}>
              <View style={styles.Frame7}>
                <View style={styles.Frame6}>
                  <Text style={styles.Txt914}>
                    Donna Regali needs your help
                  </Text>
                  <Text style={styles.Txt829}>
                    Saint Bernard Hospital, Angel Street 21
                  </Text>
                </View>
                <View style={styles.Frame7}>
                  <Text style={styles.Txt539}>Short Information</Text>
                  <Text style={styles.Txt715}>
                    Donna needs donations for AB blood type.
                  </Text>
                </View>
              </View>
            </View>
          </View>
        </View> */}
        {/* <View style={styles.Frame5}>
          <View style={styles.FriendsRow}>
            <View style={styles.Friend}>
              <View style={styles.Frame7}>
                <View style={styles.Frame6}>
                  <Text style={styles.Txt914}>
                    Donna Regali needs your help
                  </Text>
                  <Text style={styles.Txt829}>
                    Saint Bernard Hospital, Angel Street 21
                  </Text>
                </View>
                <View style={styles.Frame7}>
                  <Text style={styles.Txt539}>Short Information</Text>
                  <Text style={styles.Txt715}>
                    Donna needs donations for AB blood type.
                  </Text>
                </View>
              </View>
            </View>
          </View>
        </View> */}
      </View>
    </View>
  );
}

const styles = StyleSheet.create({
  Container: {
    display: 'flex',
    flexDirection: 'column',
    justifyContent: 'flex-start',
    alignItems: 'flex-start',
    paddingTop: 31,
    paddingBottom: 15,
    paddingLeft: '5%',
    paddingRight: '5%',
    width: '100%',
    // height: 464,
    backgroundColor: '#fff',
  },
  List: {
    display: 'flex',
    flexDirection: 'column',
    justifyContent: 'flex-start',
    alignItems: 'flex-start',
    paddingLeft: '5%',
    paddingRight: '5%',
    width: '100%',
  },
  Frame4: {
    display: 'flex',
    flexDirection: 'column',
    justifyContent: 'flex-start',
    alignItems: 'flex-start',
    marginBottom: 10,
    // width: 358,
  },
  FriendsRow: {
    display: 'flex',
    flexDirection: 'column',
    justifyContent: 'flex-start',
    alignItems: 'flex-start',
    paddingTop: 0,
    paddingBottom: 3,
    paddingLeft: 0,
    paddingRight: 0,
  },
  Friend: {
    display: 'flex',
    flexDirection: 'column',
    justifyContent: 'flex-start',
    alignItems: 'flex-start',
    flex: 1,
    paddingTop: 20,
    paddingBottom: 20,
    paddingLeft: 32,
    paddingRight: 32,
    borderRadius: 12,
    backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 1)',
    shadowColor: 'rgba(0,0,0,0.12)',
    elevation: 1,
    shadowOffset: { width: 0, height: 2 },
    // width: 358,

  Card: {
    display: 'flex',

    justifyContent: 'flex-start',

    shadowColor: colors.black,

    shadowOpacity: 0.2,
    shadowRadius: 8,
    borderRadius: 12,
    padding: 16,
  },
  Frame6: {
    display: 'flex',
    flexDirection: 'column',
    justifyContent: 'flex-start',
    alignItems: 'flex-start',
    marginBottom: 12,
  },
  Txt914: {
    fontSize: 17,
    // fontFamily: 'Fraunces, serif',
    fontWeight: '600',
    lineHeight: 22,
    letterSpacing: -0.4,
    color: 'rgba(0,0,0,1)',
  },
  Txt829: {

  Txt539: {

    lineHeight: 16,
    letterSpacing: -0.1,
    color: 'rgba(0,0,0,1)',
    opacity: 0.7,
  },
  Txt715: {
    fontSize: 15,
